column4: speaking of customizing screens, is it possible to customize the screen where things display as: loading this.....OK (what is the name of that screen?)
the gnome splash screen that loads the panel, desktop and that?
not sure... its the one that comes after grub...
oh, that one is very new, not much customization can be done yet, and I dont know how it can be done.
right click on one in the file manager window(nautilus) and select properties. under the open with tab, selecct the program you want.
